page.title: 09FADS FASHIONS AND TRENDS
page.content: Most young men today wear{trousers that are baggy with lots of zips. Girls wear ski pants and pastel coloured skirts. {Shoes. In fashion today are moccasins,canvas boxer boots,slip-ons,and spandaus.(pointed with side laces).In winter Dr Martins (black high laced boots)are still popular. Girls wear pixie boots ,winkle pickers,strapped shoes and high healed shoes. White seems to be a trendy colour for{socks}at the moment and you also see quite a few children with luminous socks often in two odd colours.Bilious pink and gruesome green give poor teachers headaches looking at them but the children seem to like these shades.Today most boys have short hair,Girls have long{hair.
